blendShapes.name: target_34
blendShapes.description: Ignore and do not use this blend shape.

blendShapes.name: blink
blendShapes.description: Controls the eye blinking animation for a neutral blink.

blendShapes.name: raise_eyebrows
blendShapes.description: Raises the eyebrows, typically for an expression of surprise or focus.

blendShapes.name: open_mouth
blendShapes.description: Opens the mouth for various expressions, such as talking or expressing surprise.

blendShapes.name: open_mouth2
blendShapes.description: An alternative or variant shape for opening the mouth, possibly for a different expression.

blendShapes.name: squint
blendShapes.description: Narrowing the eyes, typically used to convey suspicion, concentration, or annoyance.

blendShapes.name: raise_eyebrows2
blendShapes.description: A secondary version of eyebrow raise, typically more pronounced.

blendShapes.name: blink_right
blendShapes.description: A blink of the right eye.

blendShapes.name: sad
blendShapes.description: An expression of sadness or unhappiness, typically with a downturned mouth and eyes.

blendShapes.name: squint2
blendShapes.description: A stronger or more intense squint, possibly showing frustration or focus.

blendShapes.name: raise_eyebrows3
blendShapes.description: A third version of eyebrow raising, potentially used to express more extreme surprise or confusion.

blendShapes.name: sad_mouth
blendShapes.description: Mouth shape showing sadness, such as a frown or downturned corners.

blendShapes.name: open_mouth2.001
blendShapes.description: Another version of mouth opening, could be for a wider or more dramatic expression.

blendShapes.name: blink_right.001
blendShapes.description: A variant of the right eye blink, might have a different intensity or duration.

blendShapes.name: smile
blendShapes.description: A simple smile, showing happiness or friendliness.

blendShapes.name: open_mouth.001
blendShapes.description: A slight variation of mouth opening, could be for different speech or expressions.

blendShapes.name: open_mouth.002
blendShapes.description: Further variation of mouth opening, for exaggerated expressions like yelling or shock.

blendShapes.name: blink_left.001
blendShapes.description: A blink of the left eye.

blendShapes.name: angry_face
blendShapes.description: An angry expression, typically with furrowed brows and a scowl.

blendShapes.name: slight_smile
blendShapes.description: A subtle smile, possibly indicating mild happiness or amusement.

blendShapes.name: tired_face
blendShapes.description: A facial expression that conveys tiredness or exhaustion, with droopy eyes and mouth.

blendShapes.name: smile2
blendShapes.description: A more pronounced smile, possibly indicating greater joy or amusement.

blendShapes.name: o_mouth
blendShapes.description: A mouth shaped like an 'O', often used to express surprise, shock, or amazement.

blendShapes.name: grin
blendShapes.description: A wide grin, often used for mischievous or cheeky expressions.

blendShapes.name: smile_eyes
blendShapes.description: A smile combined with eyes that express joy or amusement.

blendShapes.name: v_eyes
blendShapes.description: Eyes forming a 'V' shape, usually seen in expressions of surprise or disbelief.

blendShapes.name: smile3
blendShapes.description: A third variant of the smile, possibly more exaggerated or showing more teeth.

blendShapes.name: spike_teeth
blendShapes.description: Sharp or pointed teeth exposed, often used for vampire-like or aggressive expressions.

blendShapes.name: spike_teet2
blendShapes.description: A second version of spike teeth, showing a more intense or exaggerated effect.

blendShapes.name: blink_left
blendShapes.description: Another left eye blink.

blendShapes.name: spike_teeth3
blendShapes.description: A third version of spike teeth, with more pronounced aggression or monstrous form.

blendShapes.name: spike_teeth4
blendShapes.description: A fourth variant of the spike teeth expression, possibly even more dramatic.

blendShapes.name: scream
blendShapes.description: An expression of screaming, with wide eyes and mouth.

blendShapes.name: angry
blendShapes.description: A more intense angry expression, with furrowed brows, tight lips, and often bared teeth.

blendShapes.name: surprise
blendShapes.description: An expression of surprise, typically with wide eyes, raised eyebrows, and an open mouth.
